      • width

        public HText width(float w)
        Description copied from class: HDrawable
        Sets the width of this drawable. If this drawable is set to resize proportionally, the height will also change accordingly via onResize(float,float,float,float).
        Overrides:
        width in class HDrawable
        Parameters:
        w - The new width for this drawable
        Returns:
        This drawable.
        See Also:
        HDrawable.size(float,float), HDrawable.size(float), HDrawable.height(float)

      • height

        Description copied from class: HDrawable

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PGraphics g,
                 boolean usesZ,
                 float drawX,
                 float drawY,
                 float alphaPc)
        Description copied from class: HDrawable
        Draws this drawable. This method is abstract and is meant to be implemented by the children of this class. Also, this method is primarily called internally during the draw cycle and probably wouldn't need to be called directly.
        Specified by:
        draw in class HDrawable
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics context for this drawable.
        usesZ - Indicates if z-coordinates are used.
        drawX - The x coordinate where this drawable would consider as 0
        drawY - The y coordinate where this drawable would consider as 0
        alphaPc - The current alpha value in the draw cycle.
